results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of compositions of n with 2k parts and circular differences all equal to 1 or -1, (n >= 3, 1 <= k <= n/3).
comment: All values are even since the parts must alternate between even and odd and therefore a composition is never equal to its reversal.
The longest compositions will consist of alternating 1's and 2's. The number of parts cannot then exceed n / 3.
example: For n = 11 there are a total of 8 compositions:
program: step(R,n)={matrix(n,n,i,j, if(i>j, if(j>1, R[i-j,j-1]) + if(j+1<=n, R[i-j,j+1])))}
T(n)={my(v=vector(n\3)); for(k=1, n, my(R=matrix(n,n,i,j,i==j&&abs(i-k)==1), m=0); while(R, m++; if(m%2==0, v[m/2]+=R[n,k]); R=step(R,n))); v}
